priorVersion.title: CDISC Questionnaire C-SSRS Baseline Test Code Terminology

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for codelist C100168

self.title: CDISC Questionnaire C-SSRS Baseline Test Code Terminology

definition: Columbia-Suicide Severity Rating Scale Baseline test code.
name: Columbia-Suicide Severity Rating Scale Baseline Questionnaire Test Code
preferredTerm: CDISC Questionnaire C-SSRS Baseline Test Code Terminology
synonyms: Columbia-Suicide Severity Rating Scale Baseline Questionnaire Test Code

terms.definition: Columbia-Suicide Severity Rating Scale Baseline - Have you wished you were dead or wished you could go to sleep and not wake up?
terms.preferredTerm: C-SSRS Baseline - Wish to be Dead or go to Sleep and not Wake Up

terms.definition: Columbia-Suicide Severity Rating Scale Baseline - Description of wishing to be dead.
terms.preferredTerm: C-SSRS Baseline - Description of Wish to be Dead

terms.definition: Columbia-Suicide Severity Rating Scale Baseline - Have you actually had any thoughts of killing yourself?
terms.preferredTerm: C-SSRS Baseline - Non-Specific Suicidal Thought

terms.definition: Columbia-Suicide Severity Rating Scale Baseline - Description of non-specific active suicidal thoughts.
terms.preferredTerm: C-SSRS Baseline - Description of Non-Specific Suicide Thought

terms.definition: Columbia-Suicide Severity Rating Scale Baseline - Have you been thinking about how you might do this?
terms.preferredTerm: C-SSRS Baseline - Suicidal Ideation-No Intent

terms.definition: Columbia-Suicide Severity Rating Scale Baseline - Description of active suicidal ideation with any methods (not plan) without intent to act.
terms.preferredTerm: C-SSRS Baseline - Description of Suicidal Ideation-No Intent

terms.definition: Columbia-Suicide Severity Rating Scale Baseline - Have you have these thoughts and had some intention of acting on them?
terms.preferredTerm: C-SSRS Baseline - Ideation With Intent, No Plan

terms.definition: Columbia-Suicide Severity Rating Scale Baseline - Description of active suicidal ideation with some intent to act, without specific plan.
terms.preferredTerm: C-SSRS Baseline - Description of Ideation With Intent, No Plan
synonyms: CSS01-Ideation With Intent No Plan Descr

terms.definition: Columbia-Suicide Severity Rating Scale Baseline - Have you started to work out or worked out the details of how to kill yourself? Do you intend to carry out this plan?
terms.preferredTerm: C-SSRS Baseline - Ideation With Plan/Intent

terms.definition: Columbia-Suicide Severity Rating Scale Baseline - Description of active suicidal ideation with specific plan and intent.
terms.preferredTerm: C-SSRS Baseline - Description of Ideation With Plan and Intent

terms.definition: Columbia-Suicide Severity Rating Scale Baseline - Most severe ideation.
terms.preferredTerm: C-SSRS Baseline - Most Severe Ideation

terms.definition: Columbia-Suicide Severity Rating Scale Baseline - Description of most severe ideation.
terms.preferredTerm: C-SSRS Baseline - Describe Most Severe Ideation

terms.definition: Columbia-Suicide Severity Rating Scale Baseline - How many times have you had these thoughts?
terms.preferredTerm: C-SSRS Baseline - Frequency of Most Severe Ideation

terms.definition: Columbia-Suicide Severity Rating Scale Baseline - When you have the thoughts, how long do they last?
terms.preferredTerm: C-SSRS Baseline - Duration of Most Severe Ideation

terms.definition: Columbia-Suicide Severity Rating Scale Baseline - Could/can you stop thinking about killing yourself or wanting to die if you want to?
terms.preferredTerm: C-SSRS Baseline - Control over Most Severe Ideation

terms.definition: Columbia-Suicide Severity Rating Scale Baseline - Are there things - anyone or anything (e.g., family, religion, pain of death) - that stopped you from wanting to die or acting on thoughts of committing suicide?
terms.preferredTerm: C-SSRS Baseline - Deterrents to Most Severe Ideation

terms.definition: Columbia-Suicide Severity Rating Scale Baseline - What sort of reasons did you have for thinking about wanting to die or killing yourself? Was it to end the pain or stop the way you were feeling (in other words you couldn't go on living with this pain or how you were feeling) or was it to get attention, revenge or a reaction from others? Or both?
terms.preferredTerm: C-SSRS Baseline - Reasons for Most Severe Ideation

terms.definition: Columbia-Suicide Severity Rating Scale Baseline - Have you made a suicide attempt? Have you done anything to harm yourself? Have you done anything dangerous where you could have died?
terms.preferredTerm: C-SSRS Baseline - Actual Suicide Attempt

terms.definition: Columbia-Suicide Severity Rating Scale Baseline - Total number of actual attempts.
terms.preferredTerm: C-SSRS Baseline - Number of Actual Suicide Attempts

terms.definition: Columbia-Suicide Severity Rating Scale Baseline - Description of actual attempt.
terms.preferredTerm: C-SSRS Baseline - Description of Actual Suicide Attempts

terms.definition: Columbia-Suicide Severity Rating Scale Baseline - Has the subject engaged in non-suicidal self-injurious behavior.
terms.preferredTerm: C-SSRS Baseline - Non-suicidal Self-injurious Behavior

terms.definition: Columbia-Suicide Severity Rating Scale Baseline - Has there been a time when you started to do something to try to end your life but someone or something stopped you before you actually did anything?
terms.preferredTerm: C-SSRS Baseline - Interrupted Suicide Attempt

terms.definition: Columbia-Suicide Severity Rating Scale Baseline - Total number of interrupted attempts.
terms.preferredTerm: C-SSRS Baseline - Number of Interrupted Suicide Attempts

terms.definition: Columbia-Suicide Severity Rating Scale Baseline - Description of interrupted attempt.
terms.preferredTerm: C-SSRS Baseline - Description of Interrupted Suicide Attempt

terms.definition: Columbia-Suicide Severity Rating Scale Baseline - Has there been a time when you started to do something to try to end your life but you stopped yourself before you actually did anything?
terms.preferredTerm: C-SSRS Baseline - Aborted Suicide Attempt

terms.definition: Columbia-Suicide Severity Rating Scale Baseline - Total number of aborted attempts.
terms.preferredTerm: C-SSRS Baseline - Number of Aborted Suicide Attempts

terms.definition: Columbia-Suicide Severity Rating Scale Baseline - Description of aborted attempt.
terms.preferredTerm: C-SSRS Baseline - Description of Aborted Suicide Attempt

terms.definition: Columbia-Suicide Severity Rating Scale Baseline - Have you taken any steps towards making a suicide attempt or preparing to kill yourself (such as collecting pills, getting a gun, giving valuables away or writing a suicide note)?
terms.preferredTerm: C-SSRS Baseline - Preparatory Acts or Behaviors Toward Suicide Attempt

terms.definition: Columbia-Suicide Severity Rating Scale Baseline - Description of preparatory acts or behavior.
terms.preferredTerm: C-SSRS Baseline - Description of Preparatory Acts or Behaviors Toward Suicide Attempt

terms.definition: Columbia-Suicide Severity Rating Scale Baseline - Suicidal behavior was present during the assessment period?
terms.preferredTerm: C-SSRS Baseline - Suicidal Behavior

terms.definition: Columbia-Suicide Severity Rating Scale Baseline - Most recent attempt date.
terms.preferredTerm: C-SSRS Baseline - Most Recent Suicide Attempt Date

terms.definition: Columbia-Suicide Severity Rating Scale Baseline - Most recent attempt actual lethality/medical damage.
terms.preferredTerm: C-SSRS Baseline - Most Recent Suicide Attempt Damage

terms.definition: Columbia-Suicide Severity Rating Scale Baseline - Most recent attempt potential lethality.
terms.preferredTerm: C-SSRS Baseline - Most Recent Suicide Attempt Potential

terms.definition: Columbia-Suicide Severity Rating Scale Baseline - Most lethal attempt date.
terms.preferredTerm: C-SSRS Baseline - Most Lethal Suicide Attempt Date

terms.definition: Columbia-Suicide Severity Rating Scale Baseline - Most lethal attempt actual lethality/medical damage.
terms.preferredTerm: C-SSRS Baseline - Most Lethal Suicide Attempt Damage

terms.definition: Columbia-Suicide Severity Rating Scale Baseline - Most lethal attempt potential lethality.
terms.preferredTerm: C-SSRS Baseline - Most Lethal Suicide Attempt Potential

terms.definition: Columbia-Suicide Severity Rating Scale Baseline - Initial/first attempt date.
terms.preferredTerm: C-SSRS Baseline - First Suicide Attempt Date

terms.definition: Columbia-Suicide Severity Rating Scale Baseline - Initial/first attempt actual lethality/medical damage.
terms.preferredTerm: C-SSRS Baseline - First Suicide Attempt Damage

terms.definition: Columbia-Suicide Severity Rating Scale Baseline - Initial/first attempt potential lethality.
terms.preferredTerm: C-SSRS Baseline - First Suicide Attempt Potential
